---------- Weight factors of the objective function -------- 

c1: 0.33 	 (For travel-time of the buses)
c2: 0.33 	 (For walking time of the passengers)
c3: 0.34 	 (For the absolute difference in desired arrival time and actual arrival time of the passengers)

---------------------- Parameters -------------------------- 

Number of buses: 12
Number of mandatory bus stops: 6
Number optional bus stops per cluster: 5 
 --> One cluster between each mandatory stop: 25 optional stops in total
Total number of bus stops: 31
Number of passenger requests: 48
Bus capacity: 20 passengers
Planning horizon: 15120s
Minimum time between two buses departing from a mandatory stop: 1200s
Maximum walking time for any passenger: 1200 seconds
Maximum amount of time a passenger can arrive too early: 900 seconds
Maximum amount of time a passenger can arrive too late: 300 seconds
Maximum amount of time a passenger can depart too early: 300 seconds
Maximum amount of time a passenger can depart too late: 900 seconds
